lines.text: [the morning newspaper hits the front door]
Some morning I'm gonna catch up with that kid.
[Ralph whispers something in his father's ear, and the two embrace]

[when Hilliard threatens him with a gun]
You haven't got it in you, Pop.
I've got it in me, all right. *You* put it there.
Get out. Get out of my house!
You don't have it in ya, Pop.
Yes I do. You put it there.
You listen to your old man, kid. He knows where it's buttered.
I got my guts full of you shiny-shoed wise guys with handkerchiefs in their pockets!
